name: Pacific Gas & Electric Company PG&E
description: Pacific Gas & Electric Company PG&E is a leading utility provider in California, offering electricity and natural gas services to millions of customers. They are committed to delivering safe, reliable, and affordable energy while promoting sustainability and innovation.
emergency_steps:
1. Contact PG&E immediately at 1-800-743-5000 for any electricity-related emergencies.
2. If there is a power outage, check the Electric Outage Center for updates.
3. Stay away from downed power lines and report them to PG&E or local authorities.
4. Use flashlights instead of candles to prevent fire hazards during outages.
5. Keep refrigerators and freezers closed to preserve food during power interruptions.

Non-Emergency Tips:  
- Regularly update your contact information with PG&E to receive important service alerts and updates here.
- Explore energy-saving tips and programs to reduce your energy use and save money by visiting PG&E's energy savings tips page.
